Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product is not just any item; it's a game-changer in its field, offering unparalleled features and benefits. Considering its exceptional quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value. For you, I am offering this remarkable product at an exclusive price of $150. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience with our top-tier solution. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
